item.description:
Join us for some summer fun and sun at our 36th Annual Cape Cod Weekend down in Dennisport.

Weekend includes:
• Room for Friday and Saturday nights at the Colony Beach Motel located in Dennisport, MA
• Continental breakfast each day
• Lunch and Drinks by the pool on Saturday afternoon
• Barbeque Dinner and Drinks Saturday night (with choice of steak or chicken) and lots of good stuff to eat

The hotel is located right on the ocean with a small beach and also has an outdoor heated pool.

Cost varies depending on number of people in your room and what type of room you request.

$127.50/pp based on double-occupancy for a regular room with 2 double beds ($235 for single occupancy)
$140.00/pp based on double occupancy for an efficiency unit with 2 double beds, pullout sofa, and kitchenette ($260 for single occupancy)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be basking in the sun by the pool or on our private beach

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Innitou 36th Annual Cape Weekend in Dennisport
